<span id="ranger"></span>
= Ranger =

Rangers are responsible for maintaining the natural environment and administering operations related to the department, such as the zoo, animal shelter, and farming practices.

<div class="figure">

[[File:https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/838356841217916989/1165664188547469313/2021-04-25_01.25.15.png?ex=6547ac5f&is=6535375f&hm=3469ed698b8edc7923e9e047a2d5a22bf10d26a6135f50ba04a4048a151b7613&=&width=1266&height=671|Image]]

</div>
<span id="duties"></span>
== Duties ==

Rangers are charged with several duties, including:

'''Shelterwork''' - Work at the shelter to attend to people wanting to buy pets. - Ensure there are enough pets of every kind (by breeding them or collecting them from the wild). - Take stray animals left abandoned to the shelter and inform their owner they can be picked up at the shelter.

'''Ranger Reports and Evictions''' - Create ranger reports and evictions for violations (DOI related laws). - Make reports for violations and send them to the relevant individuals. - Perform landscaping/removal tasks and create reports on the forums for payment.

<span id="structure"></span>
== Structure ==

'''Secretary:''' Manages the department operations.

'''Deputy Secretary:''' Assists in the leadership of the department.

'''Senior Ranger:''' Support the Secretary and the Deputy Secretary, train the new rangers, take on bigger projects/reports and help with the zoo.

'''Ranger:''' Does ranger reports, shelter work and ranger evictions.

<div class="figure">

[[File:https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/838356841217916989/1165664195036070028/2022-09-23_20.54.01.png?ex=6547ac61&is=65353761&hm=cef761b5d1688e01d420ee49352719882ea3a312e01af9852b68b277f5bdb50e&=&width=1266&height=671|Image]]

</div>
<span id="protocols"></span>
== Protocols ==

'''Expectations''' - The expectation for this department is to ensure everyone is contributing to the ongoing preservation and revitalization of the server’s aesthetic.

'''Activity''' - Rangers must meet basic standards of in-game activity and job commitment.

<span id="application-process"></span>
== Application Process ==

To apply for the Ranger position, you need to complete an application and meet the requirements outlined [https://www.democracycraft.net/threads/application-information.12/ here].

<ol style="list-style-type: decimal;">
<li><p>Go to the Forums -&gt; Department of the Interior -&gt; Applications.</p>
<div class="figure">

[[File:https://i.imgur.com/MMvZAoA.png|Forum Application]]

</div></li>
<li><p>Click on ‘Applications’ &amp; ‘Apply’.</p>
<div class="figure">

[[File:https://i.imgur.com/X7jlX9L.png|Click Apply]]

</div></li>
<li><p>Fill in your details and submit the application.</p></li></ol>

For any application-related questions, visit #government-support on the main Discord and open a ticket in relation to the department you are applying under.
